title: Implement Note Creation
description: Create the core note creation logic with sync queue integration.
instructions: Implement a createNote method that: 1) Generates a UUID for the note, 2) Inserts into local database with pending status, 3) Queues a sync operation, 4) Returns the created note.
hints: Use const Uuid().v4() to generate a unique ID
Create a NotesCompanion for database insertion
Queue the sync operation after local insert
Return the note from the database to get all fields
